easyNorseMythologyQuestions.question: Who is the chief god in Norse mythology?
What is the name of the hammer wielded by Thor?
Which mythical tree connects the nine realms in Norse mythology?
Who is the trickster god in Norse mythology?
What is the name of the golden hall in Asgard, home to some of the gods?
Which monstrous serpent is destined to fight Thor during Ragnarök?
What are the female spirits of fate who control human destinies in Norse mythology called?
Which goddess is associated with love and beauty in Norse mythology?
What is the name of the legendary wolf that will play a role in the events of Ragnarök?
Who is the guardian of the Bifrost, the rainbow bridge that connects Asgard to the other realms?

mediumNorseMythologyQuestions.question: What is the name of Odin's magical, eight-legged horse?
Which giant is destined to blow the horn at Ragnarök, signaling the end of the world?
Which two animals are said to pull the chariot of the moon in Norse mythology?
What is the name of the rainbow bridge that connects Midgard (Earth) to Asgard?
Who is the father of the thunder god Thor?
Which dwarves created Thor's hammer, Mjölnir?
What is the name of the magical mead of poetry in Norse mythology?
Which goddess is associated with the underworld and is the daughter of Loki?
What is the name of the world inhabited by the light elves in Norse mythology?
Who is the giantess that is married to the sea god Ægir and hosts feasts for the gods?

hardNorseMythologyQuestions.question: What is the name of the ship made from the fingernails of the dead that will carry the giants during Ragnarök?
Who is the father of the wolf Fenrir, the serpent Jörmungandr, and Hel, the ruler of the dead?
What is the name of the rooster that will crow to signal the beginning of Ragnarök?
Which dwarf turned into a dragon after being cursed by the gods for his greed?
What is the name of the boar that is said to be a harbinger of Ragnarök?
Which two beings will survive Ragnarök and repopulate the world?
Who is the giantess who tried to marry Thor but was ultimately tricked by him?
What is the name of the great wolf that will devour the sun during Ragnarök?
What is the name of the sword that Odin wields and which can slay the wolf Fenrir during Ragnarök?
Which god is known as the protector of justice and law in Norse mythology?
